rect.style: fill: rgb(243, 243, 238); fill-opacity: 1;

g.style: box-sizing: content-box; position: absolute; left: 0px; overflow: visible; shape-rendering: crispedges; pointer-events: all;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Widget immutabile che non può cambiare il proprio stato

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Per contenuti statici o che dipendono solo da parametri esterni

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Solo quando il widget padre si ricostruisce

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Widget mutabile che può gestire e aggiornare il proprio stato

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Mutabile - può avere stato interno modificabile

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Meno performante - gestisce setState() e ricostruzioni

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
text.tspan: Per contenuti dinamici che cambiano in base alle interazioni

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Ogni volta che setState() viene chiamato

rect.style: stroke: rgb(229, 229, 229); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(248, 249, 250); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: auto; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
opacity: 1; font-family: 'FK Grotesk Neue'; font-size: 28px; fill: rgb(19, 52, 59); fill-opacity: 1; font-weight: 1000; white-space: pre;
